publicwhip.spmotion: *S3M-8082 Maureen Watt: Scotland’s Finest Woods Award—That the Parliament welcomes the launch of what is considered the prestigious Scotland’s Finest Woods Award 2011 including the new award sponsored by the Woodland Trust Scotland for new native woodland creation projects that demonstrate exemplary use of management techniques; encourages woodland owners and managers across Scotland to enter their best projects in the competition before the closing date of 21 April, and looks forward to the award day on 24 June at the Royal Highland Show. Motions and amendments which have attracted additional support
S3M-8082 Scotland’s Finest Woods Award (lodged on 7 March 2011) Jamie Hepburn*, Linda Fabiani*, Kenneth Gibson*, Brian Adam*, Mary Scanlon*, Gil Paterson*, Christina McKelvie*, Stewart Maxwell*
